meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Alex Koral Rose Curtin Steven Grade Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7963.

td.p: Alex Koral, a regulatory research counsel from Boulder, Colorado
Rose Curtin, an editor and yarn shop clerk from Newport, Kentucky
Steven Grade, a sports industry consultant from Atlanta, Georgia (whose 5-day cash winnings total $115,501)

tr.td: THE SWEET SCIENCE OF BOXING
A VERY VERSATILE TOOL WORD
DUMPLINGS BY ANY OTHER NAME
HABITATS
FOR HUMANITY
